summary: This is a very simple mod that adds a new alchemical ingredient; Frost Moss.  Basically, it is a simple retexture of Hanging Moss.  It uses the same meshes as Hanging Moss but with new textures and with two new alchemical properties.
descriptionHtml:
************************************************************************
                              Frost Moss
			     by Candlepin    

************************************************************************

                       
DESCRIPTION
===========

This is a very simple mod that adds a new alchemical ingredient; Frost Moss.  Basically, it is a simple retexture of Hanging Moss.  It uses the same meshes as Hanging Moss but with new textures.  

Frost Moss has a weight of 0.1 and a value of 25.  In terms of the leveling lists, which determines what items spawn in containers, sellers of 
alchemy reagents, etc Frost Moss is set to rare.

In addition to vendor/loot availability, a number of instances of respawnable, harvestable Frost Moss plants have been placed across Skyrim, 
particularly in places of snowy, high elevation.

For a spoiler-alert list of the four alchemical properties of Frost Moss, scroll to the bottom of this file.

This mod also adds two new alchemical properties (see bottom) that currently don\'t exist for any other ingredients (see possible future changes).  


INSTALLATION
============

1. Put the CP_Frostmoss.esp file into your Skyrim/Data folder (default is Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data).
2. Click \"Data Files\" from the Skyrim launcher and check the ESP on the list.
3. Play the game.


UNINSTALLATION
==============

Remove the CP_Frostmoss.esp file from your Skyrim/Data folder or uncheck the ESP on the data files list from the launcher.


KNOWN ISSUES
============

None that I know of.  Please let me know if you have any issues.


POSSIBLE FUTURE CHANGES
=======================

I may, at some point in the future, add or modify other ingredients with the same new alchemical property (see bottom).


CHANGE LOG
==========

4/14/2013 1.0 
Initial release.














**Spoiler Alert**  Do NOT scroll any further unless you wish to know the alchemical properties of Frost Moss.














Frost Moss Alchemical Properties:

1. Slow
2. Frost Cloak*
3. Paralysis
4. Ghostveil*

*New alchemical properties
author: Candlepin
